column6: Tax governance, control, and risk management
column7: Risk management is embedded in all our critical business activities, functions, processes and systems through risk assessment, control, and materiality.

column6: Stakeholder engagement and management of concerns related to tax
column7: Aristocrat Leisure acts with integrity when engaging with tax authorities to support positive and sustainable relationships. To obtain certainty of our tax positions, we engage with tax authorities in real time regarding the application of the tax law and identify and resolve any disagreements on a timely basis.

Under Australian taxation law, the Company and its wholly-owned Australian-controlled entities are part of a tax-consolidated group. Aristocrat Leisure Limited is the head entity in the tax-consolidated Group. Entities within the tax-consolidated Group have entered into a tax funding arrangement and a tax-sharing agreement with the head entity. Under the terms of the tax funding arrangement, Aristocrat Leisure Limited and each of the entities in the tax-consolidated Group have agreed to pay (or receive) a tax equivalent payment to (or from) the head entity based on the current tax liability or current tax asset of the entity.

column13: Aristocrat Leisure has introduced an enhanced Health & Safety Incident Reporting and Data Management System, INTELEX, to streamline the reporting process for all safety incidents. This innovative platform ensures comprehensive incident documentation and efficient data management, promoting a safer workplace environment by facilitating the prompt reporting and analysis of safety incidents.

column13: Aristocrat Leisure's "Know Your Max" Campaign promotes responsible gambling by empowering players to understand and manage their betting limits effectively. The campaign encourages players to make informed decisions through educational initiatives and personalised tools, fostering a safer and more enjoyable gaming experience.
column20: Know Your Max Campaign, positive play campaign, consumer marketing campaign

column13: Aristocrat Leisure conducts regular pulse surveys to gauge employee satisfaction, gather feedback, and assess workplace morale. These surveys provide valuable insights into employee perspectives and help drive continuous improvement initiatives within the company.
column20: Regular pulse surveys, Management and Mitigation, wellbeing program

column13: Aristocrat Leisure's Employee Assistance Program is a comprehensive support system that addresses employees' various personal and professional challenges. The program aims to promote well-being and resilience among employees through confidential counselling, mental health resources, and other supportive services. Aristocrat Leisure ensures its employees can thrive personally and professionally by fostering a supportive work environment.
column20: Employee Assistance Program, Management and Mitigation, Safety and Wellbeing

column13: Aristocrat Leisure's Driver Safety software is a cutting-edge solution to enhance employee road safety. By monitoring driving behaviour, providing real-time feedback, and analysing data to identify areas for improvement, the software helps mitigate risks and promote safer driving practices. Through proactive measures and actionable insights, Aristocrat Leisure prioritises the well-being of its employees while upholding high standards of safety on the road.
column20: Driver Safety software, Management and Mitigation, safety and wellbeing

column13: Aristocrat Leisure conducts Crisis Event Tabletop Exercises to effectively simulate and prepare for potential emergencies. These exercises involve scenario-based simulations and discussions among key stakeholders to enhance crisis response strategies and communication protocols. By proactively engaging in these exercises, Aristocrat Leisure ensures readiness to manage crises, safeguarding its employees, assets, and reputation.
column20: Crisis event tabletop exercises, unplanned Operational Incident, simulations and training
